Name: Dungeon & Adventure
About the game: Dungeon & Adventure is an adventure game with puzzle and first-person shooter elements. Take on the role of a traveler and go on an adventure deep into a dangerous dungeon. Explore mysterious locations and find an ancient ring that will give you a spirit! You have to go through a dangerous path, solving puzzles and fighting various monsters alone. Use your staff and magic to survive in this monstrous place. Carefully explore each room because danger lurks everywhere! Make your way through the ancient ruins and find the ring that everyone thought was a myth! Peculiarities - A variety of puzzles. - Colorful graphics. - Dangerous opponents
